reviews.text: The mall is beautiful , well located, nice stores and the food court has lots of options

A lovely, airy, concrete cathedral with amazing stained glass that captures Fortaleza’s sunlight perfectly. It’s definitely a perfect symbol for the city - colourful, vibrant, larger than life and also slightly falling to pieces at the same time. With all the doors open, there is a terrific breeze which cools down the whole place. Just across the road from the central markets and shopping areas

The Metropolitan Cathedral of St. Joseph is a historical monument, located in the center of the city, and stands out for its architectural grandeur. This catholic church was built in 1978, in Roman-Gothic style, but on the grounds of an old chapel of Our Lady of Amparo from the 17th century. Its name venerates the Saint Joseph as the patron of Ceará. Currently this Cathedral is the third largest in the country, with capacity for five thousand people.
Beautiful gothic architecture style.
Top
Delicious place to come! Enjoy nice food, friendly people in a nice and breeze tables.
Top
Top
Empty of consumers and sellers. It's a surprise it's still open.
Amazing
Top top!
Pretty nice place

Regular...

Uma das 20 estações da linha sul do metrô. Atende a região do bairro Porangabussu onde se localiza uma série de serviços médicos importantes, como o hospital das clínicas, a maternidade escola, o Hemoce, o Hospital do Câncer e o campus Porangabussu da Universidade Federal do Ceará ligado a medicina. Tem uma ampla praça no seu acesso.

Espaço bom, limpo. Com segurança.  O metrô tem sido uma das maiores benfeitorias já realizadas em Fortaleza,  pois tem preço acessível e é muito rápido e ainda facilita o transporte entre Maracanaú e Fortaleza. Um dos únicos lugares da cidade onde você pode mexer no celular despreocupadamente.
Funcionários muito educados. O problema é apenas o mesmo de boa parte das outras estações do METROFOR: quando chove alaga.

Ferreira's Square is a historical heritage located in the center of Fortaleza city. It is named with reference to the pharmacist Boticário Ferreira, a city councilor who  reformed and urbanized this space in 1871. It was the scene of literary "Spiritual Bakery" in 1892. Until today this square is the "heart" of Fortaleza as a privileged meeting point of the capital and well known for its time column and a small garden surrounded by a lot of stores.
Main square in the city centre. Lot's of shops around.
Lots of cheap shops. Some nice old buildings. Better dont take too many fotos - in general it is a rather dangerous area. I wouldnt recommend to walk around at night.
Ok
Regular.

Beautiful museum. A bit sad because of the history of slavery. Rich in history. But it deserves more funding. Some of the art deserves to be more protected, as it could easily break or be damaged. Definitely a museum to see.

The Museum of Ceará  is a nineteenth-century building from 1876. It already housed the Provincial Assembly, the Electoral Court, a College of Law, the Ceará High School and, in 1990, became the Museum of Ceará.
Currently, At 142 years of age, this historic building preserves its neoclassical Brazilian style and the Fortaleza city`s history.
The Museum has collections telling the history of Ceará: Paleontology, Archeology / Indigenous Anthropology and Furniture.
Who visits the Museum finds permanent thematic exhibitions, with themes of interest in the history of Ceará, such as political powers, slavery, struggles and popular revolts, religiosity and intellectual production of Ceará.
Show
Show
Show

Muito bom o museu!! Carros antigos e lindos, bem cuidados, de donos que os mantém em funcionamento e por vezes os tiram do museu pra usá-los. Além da ótima receptividade pelo guia que vai explicando sobre cada carro e caminhão, as histórias e etc. Permite tirar muitas fotos!!! Muito legal!

reviews.author_name: Antonio Joaquim R de Oliveira Filho
reviews.text: Local simples de fácil acesso e com muitas raridades do mundo do automóvel e de motocicletas
Vários modelos de carro, mas o local tem que ser restaurado, limpeza e conservação.

O Museu do Automóvel do Ceará é um museu de automóveis localizado na cidade de Fortaleza. Foi fundado em 3 de julho de 1981. A exibição de estréia contava com 35 automóveis antigos. O museu é mantido pelo Veteran Car Club do Ceará e é filiado a Federação Brasileira de Veículos Antigos.

Nice place to visit something cultural in the Fortaleza area. The bars and the shops nearby are a good place to meet friends and have a drink and some nice souvenirs. 
In the night the atmosphere is really relaxed and friendly. A nice spot to visit
It's Fine,  But It's More less Danger ! There are How many Saquears in the square  Caution!

One of the best places to visit in Fortaleza. Whether the museum or the café, you can find good options by day or by night. Try to visit the "Vaqueiros" exhibiton. Afterwards, go to Monsenhor Tabosa Avenue and drink a coconut water!
The exhibitions were cool! But it was hard to get around there because there weren't any signs. There's a nice looking cafe, but it opens at 3pm. It was very empty during day time but that was nice.

Dragão do Mar is for sure one of the most interesting places in Fortaleza. Not just the culture center itself, but the lively, pedestrian friendly and contemporary surroundings. Day or night, you will find something to do, to see, to taste or buy.

Excellent food with nice atmosphere and great service. The best dessert. Love the ginger ice-cream with coconut  It's amazing!!!
Excelente restaurant. Great appetizers. Enormous variety. All the best cachaças from everywhere in Brazil.

Good food and very friendly staff.
It would have been a nice meal if any waiter had come to our table while we were there. We left after 10 min waiting, and got food almost immediatly on the restaurant next doors.

Good place for drinking alone or with your friends and family, place is open to public, so you will see different kind of people here. Drinks here quite cheap here, a liter or skol (Beer) cost around 6 R$ only, fair enough for othere bar that will cost you like 10 to 12 R$. Place is also in front of the beach, so uf you feel swimming first, please do. Some time there is a WiFi there sometime not, you can always ask the stuff if they have, then they give you the password. (Maybe they just forgot to pay the rent for internet during the time they don't have WiFi lol). Anyways the place is good for meeting new people, there is also plenty guys walking around there selling stuff and people asking for some change if you have.
Good food and price
The place to meet Norwegians

Ótimo atendimento, preço acessível.
Os atendentes são bem rápidos e prestativos.
Pessoal bem receptivos.
Excelente. Atendimento ótimo e comida excepcional.

Não possui um sistema de avaliação dos cupons, e nem de comentários, realizei uma compra, da qual o estabelecimento não funciona aberto ao público, funciona por meio de entregas terceirizadas, além de não ter discriminado na descrição do regulamento que não pode retirar no local do estabelecimento, uma vez que o local não é aberto ao público, aparenta ser uma residência.

Não atende telefone, tampouco gera cupom de oferta comprada e já debitada no cartão. Fica impossível estabelecer contato com a equipe Barato Coletivo pra resolver qualquer problema desse jeito. Estou me sentindo lesada!

Oi me chamo Marcicleia, fiz uma compra pelo Barato Coletivo no dia 13/12/2017 (quarta-feira), referente a 1 Torta Doce para 40 pessoas + 400 Salgados + 1 Torta de Frango (1,5kg) + 1 Refri 2L + 100 Tortinhas no valor de R$99,90, mas a empresa não disponibiliza do Kit festa na data em que desejo, e por tal motivo solicitei através do formulário no Site Barato Coletivo, o estorno da minha compra no mesmo dia, e desde o dia 13/12/2017 venho entrando em contato com o site através do nº 85.3055-0705 e sempre me falam que irá ser resolvido no mesmo dia, só que hoje dia 18/12/2017 ainda não estornaram o valor, ficam a penas na promessa, grande descaso e falta de consideração, pois se tivesse fora do prazo de 7 dias estipulado para cancelamento, com certeza negaria o estorno, já estou me aborrecendo pois o estorno de um valor é feito em menos de minutos, qual a dificuldade disso? Por qual motivo ainda não foi feito e atendido o meu pedido?

Based on my personal experience that is my opinion: 
Range 0 - 10 
Nice place to have fun with friends and you can even have a meal there.

MUITO  BOM  .

Ridículo, pratos cacarecos e com rachaduras, som horrível e atendimento péssimo. Ainda paguei R$20,00 num estacionamento ao lado por 5 minutos.

Atendimento péssimo. Estivemos ontem (14 de agosto 2016), tivemos que chamar e implorar para o garçom fazer o nosso pedido. Depois ninguém apareceu para que pudéssemos pedir a bebida, o jeito foi ir direto na copa e pegar a bebida lá mesmo. Mesma coisa pra pagar, pedimos várias vezes a conta e nada, acabamos indo direto no caixa. Os garçons estavam ocupados assistindo o boxe que passava na TV e por isso não puderam nos atender. 
A comida até que estava mais ou menos apesar de ter muita mantega no baião de dois.

Fui almoçar lá nesse domingo e experimentei a "galinha caipira": vem só ossos e pele. Quando perguntei pra o garçom se o prato sempre vem assim, ele disse que o chefe escolheu uma raça que "não tem tanta carne." É sério isso? O lugar é espaço e agradável, porém o serviço não é dos melhores. Se tem algum prato realmente bom, nunca vou saber porque não voltarei mais.
Great food and ambiance. I sat outside and had the ceviche, carpaccio and tepan. It was great but there's still room to impress more on the food. I'll come back!
Overpriced food and low quality. It was supposed to have some fish in the sushi  not only cream cheese. Don't waste your money here, there are better places to go and have a real sushi.

Fui no restaurante jantar com mais 2 amigas, ao chegar não fomos bem recepcionadas, e notamos que os garçons acompanhavam todos os clientes até a mesa, e tratavam com bastante cortesia, porém, conosco o atendimento não foi o mesmo, acredito que porque fomos direto da praia e não fomos bem vestidas. Mas pagamos pelo jantar igual todos os outros clientes, e não nos sentimos satisfeitas com o atendimento prestado.
Restaurante com comida muito boa, o preço é um pouco acima da média, mas um ótimo custo benefício!
Que comida maravilhosa, nada do que reclamar. Melhor sushi, agora o Yakisoba a porção é pouca...
Different kinds of food at bufett.
Regular
Custo x beneficio

Foi no dia das mães do ano passado. Estive lá juntamente com minha família, mãe, irmãos, cunhada, filho... Gostei bastante do atendimento do local ao ar livre, muitas plantas. Um lugar agradável. Pretendo voltar!
bom, ambiente bem arborizado mas possui burocracia com relação a mudança de pratos. pelo preço eles poderiam ser mais flexiveis.

I was pleasantly surprised how good the food is here! It is a modest store front but don't let it fool you! The pizza is great, you can taste the freshness. Sooo much better than the big chain companies. The pasta was amazing! 12$ and you get a giant serving, enough for four bowls of pasta with garlic knots and a side salad. Highly recommend the napoletana linguine. Service was great too. They went out of their way to provide extra napkins and side of ranch.

Based on online reviews and its close proximity to my hotel, I ordered delivery during my stay in Ann Arbor.  I ordered a half Greek salad and an Italian sausage pizza.  The salad was pure perfection!  I highly recommend it.  The pizza was also very good (I enjoyed leftovers the next day, too).  I took off one star because the delivery didn't include napkins or utensils.  I mean, I'm staying in a hotel--do you really expect me to have these things readily on hand?  I had to go down to the front desk and request a plastic fork so I could eat my salad.  You guys have great food, so please don't forget the little things that travelers in hotels need.  :)

Just get pizza from this place. Chicken or Pasta is waste of money. Pizza is the best. Do not dine in. Order to go. Bathroom is horrible. They have cleaning problem. The lady who run the place trying her best she is nice. But they need to spend money on the place.

I don't know how this place has so many good reviews. I tried them for the first time last night and will not return. I stopped in for carryout pizza by the slice for my boyfriend and me. First of all, the layout of the restaurant is dysfunctional. The kitchen/working area is so small, I don't know how the three employees were able to move around. And that's another thing. The floor behind the counter has plastic pallets on it and the employees were walking around on the pallets. It was one of the strangest things I've ever seen in a pizza place. The cash register is on a small counter where other customers were just standing around waiting for their orders, so it was impossible to try to place my order and pay. After forcing my way to the register, I ordered two cheese and two pepperoni slices. The cashier could barely figure out how to price them. Cheese and pepperoni are the most basic thing you can order! There were two other customers waiting for their orders and the staff was clearly confused who was supposed to get what order. The employees were running around manically and acting like they could barely comprehend what was going on in the store with three customers! I also noticed there was no hand washing going on as food was being handled. No employee had a clear designated spot to work. They were all just doing whatever. Who manages like that? When I finally received my order they only gave me three slices. I repeated my order of two cheese and two pepperoni. A few minutes later I received my order in a small box and thought to myself "how in the world are there four slices of New York style pizza in here? Did the employee stack them on top of each other?" I was so annoyed I walked out to my car, opened the box, and guess what? Three slices of pizza stacked on top of each other. Unbelievable is all I could think. And who stacks pizza on top of each other? I walked back in and told them my order was still wrong.  A different employee took a slice of cheese pizza, threw some pepperoni on top, and put it in the oven. This is weird, right? Then she pulled it out of the oven and told me to have a great night in an extremely phony voice. She didn't even apologize for the poor service. When I was a teenager, I worked at Cottage Inn, a restaurant with a very large menu and variety of items. I could run the register, take orders, and make all the food by myself on a busy night. It might be hard, but I could certainly handle it on my own. This place can't even get pizza by the slice right with two attempts and three employees working. I was extremely embarrassed for them and would hate to see what it's like when they're actually busy. The pizza was mediocre. Try at your own risk!

My husband liked their pizza a lot and ordered from them dozens of times we recently moved and are now 4 miles away if you view the longest google map route. We have had them deliver before as the route max time also shows as 9 minutes after placing our order and waiting over 30 minutes we received a call back saying we are too far and they will not deliver to us, this woman is the same rude woman we have spoken to before. We were told it would be arriving in 45 minutes when we placed our order and gave our address and he took our payment information as usual. The correct thing to do would have been to call and apologize call back explain they would still deliver our order but in the future they will no longer deliver. She also stated we are over 6 miles away which is not true no matter what route you take. She said it's just too far and did not offer any apology. This is very expensive for what you get- we are dissapointes with our experience and would not recommend this and will be going to many of the other 50 pizza options instead from now on.
All you can eat meat for $10...
Very good for us.

One of the most traditional restaurants in Fortaleza. It brings you one of the most wonderful experiences regarding local food. My parents used to go there for celebrating their marriage anniversary. Ask for a "Peixe à Delícia" and you meet heaven.
Nice restaurant with a wonderful view!
Ordinary Tourist Trap
Poor restaurant, the food is not good, expensive and the portion is small, the waiters are rude and impolite! I don't recommend it!
